text: Hɨnihɨni 24.14 Mt 9.35, 10.18, 28.19, Lom 10.18, Kl 1.3-6, 1.23 Asɨ hulaŋ iamɨgali likɨlɨci nudɨ lɨhu hɨvɨ hɨniavɨbali agasaŋ fɨli tɨbɨ mu hɨvɨ mu hɨvɨ sulasula hɨdavɨbali uami. Sulasula hɨdavɨdaci hulaŋ iamɨgali hɨdɨlɨ mu mu agɨlaŋ igahɨlavɨbali uami. Igahɨlavɨci ci lɨci fɨli uaiaŋ susu akuaba akuaba sɨvɨla sɨvɨla mɨhiŋ agaŋ heŋ iahɨbali uami.
